channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Tiles
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Tiles

item.title: CVE-2022-4827|2024-08-03T01:55:45.347Z -- unknown -- wp%20tiles
item.description: The WP Tiles WordPress plugin through 1.1.2 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
